channel.title: Need some help
channel.description:
I know this is the wrong section but, That other section no one helps.
[quote="s p i d a z, post:1, topic:346511"][size=16pt][b]REP++++ IF YOU CAN HELP ME[/b][/size]
I am attempting to add dragonclaw models to the [b]battlescape client.[/b]
i am new to client editing
I am using this guide as an outline, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html
I am not to sure what to do, I know I add the items to itemdef But, I can't find where to put the models so they can be loaded. I just keep getting errors. Looking in Item def, they have some models going up to 18000+ but i can't access pali_cache or anything, to find out where these models are.[size=14pt][b]Need some help or a good point in the right direction, I should be able to figure out the rest.[/b] [/size] [URL=http://img9.imageshack.us/i/clienterros.png/][IMG]http://img9.imageshack.us/img9/2944/clienterros.png[/img][/URL][/quote]

item.title: Need some help
item.dc:creator: @s_p_i_d_a_z s p i d a z
item.description:
@s_p_i_d_a_z wrote:

I’ll specify my question:

Where do I add the models, for battlescape client, It doesn’t have Class 8. It Has itemdef instead, and Ive tried 3 ways to get the models added in, Each time It can’t find the model. I know there is a DFS already added in, but I have no idea where that model is.

Read full topic

item.title: Need some help

[size=16pt]REP++++ IF YOU CAN HELP ME[/size]
I am attempting to add dragonclaw models to the
battlescape client.

i am new to client editing

I am using this guide as an outline, http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363483.0.html

I am not to sure what to do, I know I add the items to itemdef But, I can’t find where to put the models so they can be loaded. I just keep getting errors. Looking in Item def, they have some models going up to 18000+ but i can’t access pali_cache or anything, to find out where these models are.[size=14pt]Need some help or a good point in the right direction, I should be able to figure out the rest.
[/size]

[/quote][/quote]
I can help you, and yeah, you dont have to actually do add model 8002, i don’t anyhow. Wheres my rep ++?
